overview: In the face of his own threatening illness, the greatest protector of jaguars is battling time and adversity to save these endangered cats. Venture deep into the wilds of Brazil, Belize, and Panama with biologist Alan Rabinowitz as he pursues these elusive predatorsâ€”and fights to protect even more jaguar habitat than he already has. Narrated by actress Glenn Close.
tagline: Join biologists in the fight to protect the elusive jaguar.
title: In Search of the Jaguar
